short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all of your fonts to Comic Sans, Papyrus, or Impact for an unpleasant browing experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Once your page is done loading, Worst Fonts will insert a piece of CSS that will make your font one of 3 of the most hated fonts on the planet. Actively, this extension contains Comic Sans MS, Papyrus, and Impact.
